citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The licensee is missing a complete species-appropriate environmental enhancement plan for birds. They have a number
of species of domestic birds including chickens, ducks, geese, turkeys, guinea fowl, peacocks, pigeons and doves. They
are providing some enrichment to the birds including social grouping, outdoor access, and clean substrate to scratch in,
but lack a written plan approved by the attending veterinarian. The plan, at a minimum, must address social grouping,
environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices, and exemptions. A species-appropriate plan for
environmental enhancement is necessary to promote the psychological well-being of the birds on the premises.
Correct by: November 3rd, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The licensee is missing a complete species-appropriate environmental enhancement plan for birds. They have a number 
of species of domestic birds including chickens, ducks, geese, turkeys, guinea fowl, peacocks, pigeons and doves. They 
are providing some enrichment to the birds including social grouping, outdoor access, and clean substrate to scratch in, 
but lack a written plan approved by the attending veterinarian. The plan, at a minimum, must address social grouping, 
environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices, and exemptions. A species-appropriate plan for 
environmental enhancement is necessary to promote the psychological well-being of the birds on the premises.  
 
Correct by: November 3rd, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
